ResearchProjectDef.label: Cigarettes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin producing a drug that offers a brief euphoria as well as mental stimulation, and is very addictive. The pungent odor is generally disliked at first, but becomes much more pleasurable as the smoker becomes more addicted. Can be crafted without equipment, at a crafting spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cigars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin producing a lavish drug that offers a brief euphoria as well as mental stimulation, and is very addictive. The pungent odor is generally disliked at first, but becomes much more pleasurable as the smoker becomes more addicted.
